## Web page

Easily create pages by entering text in markdown format. Quarto will format it into pretty pages.

You can use a wide range of tools:

- Tables, Lists
- Images, Videos
- Python or R code
- mathematical formulas
- Export pdf


## Presentation with [revealJS](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/){.external target="_blank"}

- Speaker view
- chalkboard
- print-pdf
